text:
Agree with this, although the `a`hrefs Lite plan is more than enough for me and my small business at the moment. They have lots of content to help you get the most out of the trial. If you used that, then cancelled for a bit while you prepared the content to meet those keywords, it would still be worth it.

Sam Oh does some excellent videos for them, but I regularly have to pause them just to let the content sink in a little, because it’s very full-on.
